Banner.Description: Freshly graduated software engineer with practical experience in full-stack development and DevOps. Skilled in Spring Boot, Angular, Python, microservices, CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, and IaC. Passionate about automation, learning, and building efficient pipelines.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: As a software engineering graduate with practical experience in both Full-Stack Development and DevOps Engineering, I bring a comprehensive understanding of the entire software development lifecycle. My journey has taken me through various roles and projects where I've built scalable applications and automated deployment pipelines.

My expertise spans from developing microservices architectures with Spring Boot and Angular to implementing complete DevOps pipelines with Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, ArgoCD, and Kubernetes. I'm passionate about creating efficient, automated solutions that bridge the gap between development and operations.
I thrive on learning new technologies and applying them to solve real-world problems, whether it's building e-learning platforms, IoT solutions, or implementing security measures.
Some of the technologies I have trained and worked with include (but are not limited to):
